#include <stdio.h>
typedef long long ll;
const int oo=(int)1e9;
int t,n,k,m,ms;
int mn,mx,nmn,nmx,cur,end;
int a;
ll b;
bool st;
inline void process()
{
    end=cur+k-1;
    if (mn>=cur&&mx<=end)
        return;
    a++;
    if(mn<cur)
    {
        b+=cur-mn;
        cur=mn;
    }
    else
    {
        b+=mx-end;
        cur=mx-k+1;
    }
}
int main()
{
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while (t--)
    {
        scanf("%d %d %d",&n,&k,&m);
        mn=oo;
        mx=-oo;
        cur=1;
        a=0;
        b=0;
        st=1;
        while(m--)
        {
            scanf("%d", &ms);
            if(st)
            {
                if(ms<=k)
                    continue;
                else
                    st=0;
            }
            nmn=mn;
            nmx=mx;
            if(ms<mn)
                nmn=ms;
            if(ms>mx)
                nmx=ms;
            if(nmx-nmn+1>k)
            {
                process();
                mn=ms;
                mx=ms;
            }
            else
            {
                mn=nmn;
                mx=nmx;
            }
        }
        process();
        printf("%d %lld\n",a,b);
    }
    return 0;
}
